backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing inventory logic, user profiles, shops, products, stock movements, and authorization with migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new types, mainly adding isSuperAdmin to user profiles while preserving other data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking frontend files and components to the super-admin UI update feature.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file, including routing, hooks, pages, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring React Query, router, theming, and global toasts.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first‑time users to enter name and email, preserving backend shop and admin fields on save.
frontend/src/components/branding/Logo.ts: Simple component rendering the RK Solutions logo.
Layout wrapper with header, footer, and main content area for shop and admin portals.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with role‑based navigation, logout handling, and optional shop alerts and offline UI.
frontend/src/components/layout/Notificat: Notification bell showing combined low‑stock and out‑of‑stock counts linked to the alerts page.
frontend/src/components/layout/OfflineIn: Shows an indicator when offline or syncing, linking to the sync page and displaying queued operations.
Dialog for recording a product sale by reducing stock via mutation and validating quantity.
frontend/src/components/shop/StockInDial: Dialog for adding stock to a product using a mutation and simple quantity input.
frontend/src/hooks/offline/useNetworkSta: Tracks online/offline status using browser events.
frontend/src/hooks/offline/useOfflineQue: Maintains a list of queued offline operations and exposes pending count and retry placeholder.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for Internet Identity login, state management, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, products, and shop data through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom design tokens for light and dark theme colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider around the app.
Placeholder admin page showing future access log functionality with static UI.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminHomePage.t: Admin dashboard with links to shop management, logs, and a super-admin recovery dialog.
Admin page that lists shops, handles suspend/reactivate actions, and shows super-admin error recovery UI.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AdminLoginPage.t: Admin login screen using Internet Identity that redirects authenticated users to the admin panel.
frontend/src/pages/auth/ShopLoginPage.ts: Shop login page supporting Internet Identity sign‑in, shop signup navigation, and admin login access.
frontend/src/pages/auth/ShopSignUpPage.t: Two‑step shop signup flow using Internet Identity authentication followed by shop creation with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/shop/AlertsPage.tsx: Displays low‑stock and out‑of‑stock product alerts for the shop with links to restock items.
frontend/src/pages/shop/DashboardPage.ts: Shop dashboard showing product counts, stock alerts, and navigation to product management.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProductCreatePag: Form page that lets a shop owner create a new product with name, description, initial quantity, and low‑stock threshold, then submits via createProduct and navigates back.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProductDetailPag: Displays detailed product info, stock status, recent movements, and provides actions like editing, sales, and stock‑in via dialogs.
Loads an existing product, pre-fills fields, allows editing name, description, and threshold, then updates the product and redirects.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProductsPage.tsx: Shows a searchable and filterable product list with stock badges and actions to view, edit, delete, or create products.
frontend/src/pages/shop/SyncStatusPage.t: Displays online/offline status, queued offline operations, and allows retrying sync with details on pending operations and conflict rules.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the full TanStack router tree for auth, shop, and admin sections, including protected layouts that redirect unauthenticated users and conditionally show profile setup.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, fonts, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the MVP scope, architecture, known issues, and existing feature implementations for the SaaS inventory system.
